profile.name: Adam Nguyen
profile.intro: I am a software engineer from San Jose, CA. I enjoy creating modern, responsive, intuitive user experiences. Check out some of my projects below.

details.education: B.S. Computer Science - California State University, Monterey Bay

projects.title: Video Search
projects.description: My first major project using ReactJS. The app is a simple YouTube search application that allows users to search and view videos provided by the YouTube API. It was meant to give me a better understanding of how the React library works and the importance of reusing components.
